text: xo sraththa chn thanghlay phwk cea xya di yk seiyng khxng phwk cea henux seiyng khx ngxal na bi læa xya phud seiyng dang kab khea (muhammad) yeiyng kar phud seiyng dang khxng bang khn khxng phwk cea kab xik bang khn pheraa (kerng wa) kar ngan tang«khxng phwk cea ca suy seiy pi doythi phwk cea miru suk taw
